CALLING THINGS CAUSES
After their research was finally completed, with the bacterium identified,
described, and named, it was then said that Legionella pneumophilawas the
causeof Legionnaires’ disease. What was meant by this? To simplify a bit,
suppose L. pneumophila(as it is abbreviated) entered the bodies of allthose
